channel.title: [FIXED] Not the grunt weapon
channel.description:
Normally u get those at those place full with traps in the elevator at the death body.
But no such weapon there, or maybe the weapon is placed in a different place?
Thanks!

item.title: [FIXED] Not the grunt weapon
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Okay, used the console command to receive it

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] Not the grunt weapon
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
In your current save game, yes unfortunately, as you only encounter the weapon once in single player. It’s use the code, go without it until they fix the issue, or start a new game from a chapter after you would have picked it up (So “Forget About Freeman!” or later).

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] Not the grunt weapon
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
In fact, I don’t like to use cheats in the game, so the only way to get it for now?

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] Not the grunt weapon
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
Known issue that the devs are looking into. In the meantime, you’ll have to use the console command [tt]give weapon_hivehand[/tt] to get it.

Read full topic
